amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of the text of those amendments contained in part B of House Report 106-235 which are printed on pages H6073-H6075 in the Congressional Record for July 21, 1999.
amendment.purpose: An en bloc amendment consisting of Part B amendments printed in H.Rept. 106-235 and numbered 4; 11; 23; 25; 32; 34; 35; and 41, as modified.

action.text: Gilman amendment (A021) modified by unanimous consent. The modification states that the United States Government should support the holding of a plenary session of the Iraqi National Assembly in the near future.
On agreeing to the Gilman amendments (A021) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
